author: anmenaga
body:
Ubuntu 17.10 reached End of Life.
The supported upgrade path from Ubuntu 17.10 is via Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.

Currently package file name is "powershell-preview_6.1.0~preview.4-1.ubuntu.17.10_amd64.deb".

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I think we already added 18.04.  We should add 18.10

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Maintaining packages for the non-LTS releases has been painful.  We are adding community support for 18.10 and 19.04 via the snap package.

title: Update package name "ubuntu 17.10" -> "ubuntu 18.04"
